import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; function Cards({ data: { cases, recovered, deaths, updated } }) { if(!cases) return "Loading..."; return (
Infected {new Date(updated).toDateString()} Number of active cases of Covid-19 Recovered {new Date(updated).toDateString()} Number of recovered from Covid-19 Deaths {new Date(updated).toDateString()} Number of deaths caused by Covid-19
) } export default Cards
